#include <iostream>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
    long long a,b;
    int count=0;
    long long a1=0,b1=1,temp;
    cin>>a>>b;

    while(a>0&&b>0)
    {
        while(b1<=b)
        {
            temp = b1;
            b1 = a1+b1;
            a1 = temp;
            if(a1>=a)
                count++;
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
        cin>>a>>b;
        a1 = 0;
        b1 = 1;
        temp = 0;
        count = 0;
    }
}
